packages.name: CombatHUD
packages.description: Provides some extra combat-related HUD features such as damage labels, numerical vitals, target enemy infobox, etc. Everything can be customized and toggled.

packages.name: Combat Dummy
packages.description: Allows you to spawn customizable Combat Dummies for testing or practice. Set an in-game keybinding to access the menu.

packages.name: Custom Multiplayer Limit
packages.description: Allows you to set a custom player limit for online co-op when you are the host.

packages.name: Mana Bow
packages.description: Adds Mana Bows to the game: special bows which require no Arrows, but instead consume Mana to shoot.

packages.name: Necromancer
packages.description: Adds a new skill tree focused on summoning undead creatures to fight with you.
